Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Ensure attributes are available when OuterXml property is set" (#692) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: Continues #684 for the `OuterXml` property as well as the constructor.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Ready for 2.10.1 release" (#691) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: Thie excludes OpenXmlElementFunctionalExtensions and tests for 2.10.1 release since that is new surface area not appropriate for a revision release. This will be re-enabled after the revision release. This is to get a couple of fixes out for #684 and #690 that were breaking behavior from 2.10.0

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Remove state from particle validators" (#686) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: This fixes an issue where it is non-threadsafe to validate the same element type on different threads, even if it were  from different validation runs.

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Assume known elements have a high sequence number when comparing elements" (#690) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Closed issue "Freezing excel rows doesn't work in version 2.10.0" (#680) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
